LeeSin.name: Lee SinБ
LeeSin.title: Ббthe Blind MonkБ
LeeSin.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюAs a young teen, Lee Sin was intent on becoming a summoner. His will and dedication were unmatched by any of his peers, and his skill drew the attention of Reginald Ashram, the League's High Councilor at the time. While studying at the Arcanum Majoris, Lee Sin became frustrated with instruction paced for the other students. He spent his free time researching the nuances of summoning in hopes of graduating sooner. He made amazing advances in his arcane studies, surpassing all other students. By all indications, he would have become one of the League's greatest summoners were it not for one terrible mistake. Too impatient, he attempted to test his ability by summoning a beast from the Plague Jungles. What he summoned instead was a young boy, but not in one piece. He barely had time to look the boy in what was once his face before the jumbled human mass fell lifeless to the floor. A League investigation later revealed that the boy's entire village was obliterated by feedback from the ritual.ЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзLee Sin's talents were so promising that the League was willing to overlook the incident, but he could never forgive himself. He left the Institute and journeyed to the Shojin Monastery for eternal repentance, swearing never to practice magic again. Years later, hoping to atone for his crime with martyrdom, he set himself ablaze as a protest of the Noxian occupation of Ionia. He remained alive in this state, enduring searing agony for weeks. His actions paved the way for a League match wherein Ionia prevailed, but by the time he was doused, his eyes had been burned completely from their sockets. Hailed as a savior, he was reborn, and his will to act invigorated. He joined the League of Legends to continue his atonement with sweat and blood, a true monk's only possessions.зЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖж''The actions of one may sunder the world, but the efforts of many may rebuild it.''ЗжЖдДгГбБ
Б-- Lee SinБ
LeeSin.blurb: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюAs a young teen, Lee Sin was intent on becoming a summoner. His will and dedication were unmatched by any of his peers, and his skill drew the ...
allytips: БбГгДдЖжUse Sonic Wave before Dragon's Rage so you can chase the target with Resonating Strike.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙTake advantage of Flurry by weaving in basic attacks between spell casts -- this maximizes damage output and minimizes Energy loss.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзSelf-casting Safeguard and using Iron Will are powerful tools for killing neutral monsters (in the jungle).ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдЖжStay spread out to minimize the impact of Lee Sin's ultimate, Dragon's Rage.ЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиLee Sin has powerful tools to combat physical damage in Iron Will and Cripple but he is still vulnerable to magic damage.иИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйLee Sin relies heavily on following up with his abilities. Use disables to prevent him from chaining together his abilities and attacks.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БбГSonic Wave / Resonating StrikeГбБ
spells.description:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцSonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.ЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиResonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage plus 8% of their missing health.иИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БSonic Wave: ББбГгДдЖжLee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing ЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})БбГгД physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. ДгГбББбГгДдЖжIf Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.жЖдДгГбБ

БбResonating Strike: бББбГгДдLee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing ДгГбБ{{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }})БбГгДдЖж physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health (Max: 400 damage vs. Monsters).жЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БбSafeguard / Iron WillбБ
spells.description:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлSafeguard: Lee Sin rushes towards a target ally, shielding them both from damage. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиIron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 5 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БSafeguard: ББбГгДдLee Sin rushes towards a target ally, shielding them both for дДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГ damage over the next 5 seconds.ГбББбГгДдЖж After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.ЖдДгГбБ

БIron Will: ББбГгДдЖжЗLee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 5 seconds, Lee Sin gains ЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e2 }}БбГ% Life Steal and Spell Vamp.ГбБ

spells.name: БбTempest / CrippleБ
spells.description:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпTempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.ФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпCripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies revealed by Tempest, reducing their Movement and Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Movement and Attack Speed recover gradually over the duration.пПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БTempest: ББбГгДдLee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals ЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})БбГгДд magic damage and reveals enemy units hit for 4 seconds.ДгГбББбГгДдЖж If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next 3 seconds.ЖдДгГбБ

БCripple: ББбГгДдЖжЗзИLee Sin cripples nearby enemies revealed by Tempest for 4 seconds, reducing their Movement and Attack Speed by ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e2 }}БбГгДд%. Movement and Attack Speed recover gradually over the duration.ЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БбDragon's RageБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюLee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.ЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгДдЖжLee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching an enemy champion back, dealing ЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙй physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

passive.name: FlurryБ
passive.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзAfter Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 15 Energy each.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
